chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
It hasn't been sent.
Thanks,

Hello, dear seller:

We wanted to inform you that Tarek has not received your order.

We have checked that the order has not been shipped there is no tracking link. The customer placed the order on 5/06/24. 

Can you tell us if the order has been shipped and with what tracking number?
In case the order has not yet been shipped, please send it back and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order within 1 business day.

If you have shipped the order but it has been lost, we will collect the paperwork from the customer and send it to you. We will let you know if the customer prefers a refund or reshipment.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns: we will be attentive to your response.

Thank you for your help,
Julieta, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

Tarek Berrakad
Pizarro Street, 10, 3
slate street
03570 Villajoyosa
Spain
611 68 19 21

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901199941

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB
Hello, My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem: It won't arrive. Thanks,

Thank you,

I remain attentive to your message.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Please check the link again, here it is: https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901199941/trackdetails

The tracking is active and as mentioned, we had already shipped it out. The parcel is on the way to the customer.
